__e: Then I head back home, where I'm greeted by the faint musk of baby vomit in a house that used to smell like, well, nothing.
Why do I spend every other weekend at a seminar in some two-star hotel ballroom that still stinks of last night's prom vomit?
See, that's why I only hang out with my coworkers, 'cause after a day on the rig wearing' everybody's piss and vomit,
The next morning I woke up on my back, Covered in puke, And I realized I did die.
I am cleaning the piss and the shit and the vomit, and I sit here alone with him in front of the television, and I have nobody to talk to.
You spend every day covered in blood and vomit, and you wasted your best years on a useless guy.
